q1.text: Should the federal government make it more difficult for people to buy a gun?
options: 3. Keep the rules about the same

q2.text: Should federal spending on welfare programs be increased, decreased, or kept the same?

q3.text: Should federal spending on tightening border security to prevent illegal immigration be increased, decreased, or kept the same?

q4.text: Do you favor, oppose, or neither favor nor oppose allowing transgender people to serve in the United States Armed Forces?
